data.name: Sweet Desire 3
data.detailed_description:
«Sweet Desire 3» is a hentai clicker with seductive girls in unusual costumes.
Undress hot girls in different locations.
NSFW arts, sexy girls, inviting poses, juicy bodies.



Make your wildest fantasies come true!

You may fall in love with beautiful anime girls, because all of them are incredibly hot and attractive!
Satisfy anime girls and earn points.

Many achievements, different improvements, enjoyable bonuses.

Play this hentai clicker and enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Nudity or sexually explicit scenes, Sexual adult content only, Adult content.
